name: Spinda
author: Miki Tanaka
flavor_text: No two Spinda have the same pattern of spots. Its tottering step fouls the aim of foes.

attacks.name: Synchro Removal
attacks.effect: If any Energy card attached to Spinda is the same type as any Energy card attached to the Defending Pokémon, discard 1 of those Energy cards from the Defending Pokémon.

attacks.name: Pulled Punch
attacks.effect: If the Defending Pokémon already has any damage counters on it, this attack’s base damage is 10 instead of 30.
